mapper.insert: insert into tb_coin_price_history (coin_type, one_price, company_name, search_time) values (#{coin_type}, #{one_price}, #{company_name}, #{search_time})
mapper.select: select tpm.th, tpm.uni_point, tpm.amount, tsIc.coin_type, tsIc.coin_value, tsIc.fee_coin, tsIc.company_code, datediff(tpm.end_date, tpm.start_date) as de_day, tsIc.no as income_no from tb_purchase_machine tpm inner join tb_source_Income_coin tsIc on tsIc.company_code = tpm.company_code where tsIc.confirm_yn != 1 and mining_day = #{mining_day}

select no, coin_type, coin_value, mining_day, company_code, confirm_yn, created_at, fee_coin, de_coin, fit_coin, coin_currency, coin_currency_time from tb_source_Income_coin where company_code = #{company_code} and mining_day = #{mining_day}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_source_Income_coin (coin_type, coin_value, mining_day, company_code, fee_coin) values (#{coin_type}, #{coin_value}, #{mining_day}, #{company_code}, #{fee_coin})
mapper.update: update tb_source_Income_coin set de_coin = #{de_coin}, fit_coin = #{fit_coin}, coin_currency = #{coin_currency}, coin_currency_time= str_to_date(#{coin_currency_time}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') where company_code = #{company_code} and mining_day = #{mining_day}
mapper.select: select no, buy_date, payment_date, status, purchase_no, amount, th, uni_point, company_code, start_date, end_date from tb_purchase_machine where datediff(end_date, current_date()) > 0 and start_date <= current_date()
mapper.insert: insert into tb_wallet_history (wallet_type, trans_type, amount, balance, created_user_no, income_no) values (#{wallet_type}, #{trans_type}, #{amount}, #{balance}, #{created_user_no}, #{income_no})
mapper.select: select sum(tsIc.fit_coin) as coin , sum(tpm.uni_point) as point from tb_source_Income_coin tsIc inner join tb_purchase_machine tpm on tsIc.company_code = tpm.company_code where tsIc.confirm_yn = 0 and tsIc.mining_day = #{mining_day}
select detail_type, value from tb_setting_info where deleted_at is null and main_type = 'fee'
select value from tb_setting_info where deleted_at is null and main_type = 'recommend_plus' and detail_type = 'recruit'
select tur.recommend_user_no from tb_user_sum tus inner join tb_user_recommend tur on tus.user_no = tur.user_no group by tur.recommend_user_no having sum(tus.money) >= #{money}
